Song.title: God Rest Ye Merry Gentlemen
Song.copyright: Public Domain. Words and Music: English Traditional. Arrangement: Justin Rosolino.

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [Em (8 bars)]
Verse 1: [Em]God rest ye merry gentlemen Let not[C]thingyou dis[B7]may Re[Em]member Christ our Savior Was [C]born on Christmas [B7]Day To [Am]save us all from [G]Satanâ€™s power When [Em]we were gone a[D]stray
Refrain: O ti[G]dings of [Am]comf[B7]ort and j[Cmaj7]oy [Em]Comfort and [D] joy [Em]O[D/F#] [G] tidings of co[Am]mfo[B7]rt and j[Em]oy
Verse 2: [Em]From God our heavenly Father A ble[C]ssed angel c[B7]ame And [Em]unto certain shepherds Brought t[C]idings of the s[B7]ame How [Am]that in Bethleh[G]em was born The [Em]Son of God by na[D]me.
Refrain: O ti[G]dings of [Am]comf[B7]ort and j[Cmaj7]oy [Em]Comfort and [D] joy [Em]O[D/F#] [G] tidings of co[Am]mfo[B7]rt and j[Em]oy
{new_page} Verse 3: Now [Em]to the Lord sing praises All [C]you within this p[B7]lace And [Em]with true love and charity Each [C]other now emb[B7]race This [Am]holy tide of Ch[G]ristmas Doth b[Em]ring redeeming gr[D]ace [to Refrain]
Refrain: O ti[G]dings of [Am]comf[B7]ort and j[Cmaj7]oy [Em]Comfort and [D] joy [Em]O[D/F#] [G] tidings of co[Am]mfo[B7]rt and j[Em]oy
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 god rest ye merry gentlemen let notthingyou dismay remember christ our savior was born on christmas day to save us all from satans power when we were gone astray refrain o tidings of comfort and joy comfort and joy o tidings of comfort and joy verse 2 from god our heavenly father a blessed angel came and unto certain shepherds brought tidings of the same how that in bethlehem was born the son of god by name refrain o tidings of comfort and joy comfort and joy o tidings of comfort and joy verse 3 now to the lord sing praises all you within this place and with true love and charity each other now embrace this holy tide of christmas doth bring redeeming grace refrain o tidings of comfort and joy comfort and joy o tidings of comfort and joy
